name: ruby2js-on-rails
description: Rails-like app running in JavaScript - Ruby2JS selfhost demo

scripts.dev:selfhost: npm run build:selfhost && npm run dev
scripts.dev:bun: RUNTIME=bun npm run build:ruby && bun server.mjs
scripts.dev:deno: RUNTIME=deno npm run build:ruby && deno run --allow-all server.mjs
scripts.build:selfhost: cd ../selfhost && npm run build && rm -f ruby2js-*.tgz && npm pack && cd ../ruby2js-on-rails/vendor/ruby2js && rm -f ruby2js-rails-*.tgz && npm pkg set dependencies.ruby2js=file:../../../selfhost/ruby2js-6.0.0-beta.tgz && npm pack && npm pkg set dependencies.ruby2js=https://www.ruby2js.com/releases/ruby2js-beta.tgz && cd ../.. && npm install ./vendor/ruby2js/ruby2js-rails-*.tgz && npm pkg set dependencies.ruby2js-rails=https://www.ruby2js.com/releases/ruby2js-rails-beta.tgz
scripts.test: npm run test:sql && npm run test:ar && npm run test:mvc
